In a quaint little town, there lived a scruffy terrier named Sketch. Unlike any other dog, Sketch had a peculiar talent: he could draw! With a piece of chalk clamped in his mouth, he would create vibrant pictures on the pavement. One sunny afternoon, he captured the townsfolk’s hearts by sketching a giant mural of their beloved park. Inspired, the community came together, turning his drawings into a real park renovation project. From that day on, Sketch became the town's mascot, proving that art can bring everyone together—even if it’s drawn by a dog.
